si.title: යාපනයේ නිදා ගැනීමට ගිය පුද්ගලයා මිය යයි
body_lines: නිවසේ නිවසේ නිදා සිටි පුද්ගලයා උදේ 7 ට නැගිට අවදි වූයේ නැත. නිවස ඔහුව ස්පර්ශ කිරීමට උත්සාහ කළ විට, ඔහුව සිහිසුන්ව සිටි බව සොයා ගන්නා ලදී.
මෙම නිවස යාපනයේ බෝධනා රෝහලට ඇතුළත් කර ඇති අතර ඔහු රෝහලේ ප්රතිකාර ලබා ඇත.

en.title: The man who went to sleep in Jaffna dies
body_lines: The man who slept at home at home did not get up at 7 am and did not wake up, and when the house tried to touches him, he was found unconscious.
The house was admitted to the Jaffna Bodhana Hospital and was treated at the hospital.

summary_lines: A man in Jaffna died after being found unconscious at home. He was taken to Jaffna Bodhana Hospital for treatment.
